summary: A girl who thinks she is a combat cyborg checks into a mental hospital, where she encounters other psychotics. Eventually, she falls for a man who thinks he can steal people's souls.
cast: Soo-jung Lim|Rain|Kim Byeong-Ok|Seong-hun Cheon|Hee-jin Choi|Joo-hee Eun|Yoo-rang Joo|Park Jun-Myun|Jung-yong Lee|Yong-nyeo Lee|Dal-su Oh|Byeong-eun Park|Ho-jeong Yu
keywords: six word title|female protagonist|female mental patient|female cyborg|south korea
title: Soy un cyborg
